text:
Internet is a tool that everybody use nowadays. When they search for an anwser, we ask google to find it. Internet was really use in the 2000. It was a new technologie, a new discover. But the more time flies, the more internet becomes vast and infinite in terms of research. It's everywhere, first on the computer, phone, tablets, everything digital.
It's so extensive, that many people have trouble or difficulties at using it. Like for example, the ederly because it's not of their generation, their not born with it like young people now.
  Internet has their qualities and faults.
We are going to beginning with the negatives aspects. Like I said before, Internet is infinite, so we can be easily lost. Next, it is not without danger. This discover can be use to trap people if it is not use well. Then, for some people it's addictive, like social media on Internet, so it can have trouble on the mental health.
Then, the positives aspects. Internet can help us to find anwser of our question, like for students, it can be a new platform to work. For example our situation right now with the mondial pandemie, Internet is really helpfull for students, we can always follow our class and be able to work even if it's hard. It can be use to find someone, like on social media for example. It allow to create new jobs in the field of communication, internet...
